Method Detail

getArea

double getArea()
Calculates the area of the shape.

Returns:
Returns the area of the shape as a double.

getColor

java.awt.Color getColor()
Get the color of the shape.

Returns:
Returns the color of the shape.

setColor

void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
Sets the color of the shape.

Parameters:
color - The color that the shape will be set to.

getFilled

boolean getFilled()
Check if the shape is filled or not.

Returns:
Returns true if shape is filled, false if not filled.

setFilled

void setFilled(boolean filled)
Sets the filled state of the shape to the specified value.

Parameters:
filled - A boolean true or false that the shape will be set to.

getPosition

java.awt.Point getPosition()
Gets the current position of the shape.

Returns:
Return the position of the shape.

setPosition

void setPosition(java.awt.Point position)
Changes the position of the shape to the specfied Point.

Parameters:
position - The position that the new shape will be set to.

move

void move(java.awt.Point delta)
Moves the shape by the x and y amounts specified (in the Point delta).

Parameters:
delta - Moves the shape by x and y component of delta
